app.title: ImageSeek
app.subtitle: An Hybrid Multimodal Image Retrieval System for Domain-Specific Collections

results.noResults: No results found. Please try a different search term.

loading.searchWillContinue: Your search will continue automatically once ready

intro.title: ImageSeek
intro.description: is a web-based multimodal image retrieval system that combines text-based and image-based retrieval methods through a hybrid score adjustment mechanism.
intro.dataset: Our demonstration application allows you to explore a dataset of
intro.datasetSource: from the Portuguese Presidency website through natural language queries in any language supported by the underlying models.
intro.innovation: Unlike traditional rank fusion methods that normalize both modalities equally, our system uses an
intro.innovationDescription: that treats image-based retrieval as a reliable baseline while harmonizing text-based scores through position-dependent adjustments.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Query in any language supported by the underlying models without relying on machine translation strategies

hybrid.title: Hybrid Retrieval
hybrid.description: Combines visual-semantic correspondence with contextual relevance through textual metadata

clip.title: CLIP-Based Models
clip.description: Powered by vision-language models for advanced cross-modal understanding

comparison.title: Comparative Analysis
comparison.description: Direct comparison between hybrid and conventional CLIP-based retrieval approaches

datasetInfo.label: Dataset:
datasetInfo.description: 42,333 images from the Portuguese Presidency website, providing a comprehensive testbed for multimodal retrieval in specialized domains.

footer.institutions: UBI • INESC TEC • ULisboa • NLX-Group • IT
